评论详情: This dress fit perfectly and true to size. I feel so pretty wearing it. Perfect for my anniversary photo shoot. Whimsy, romantic and the color is soft!
One of my favourite dresses ever. Wore to my cousin's wedding and got endless compliments, beautiful and fit perfectly!

The dress is absolutely gorgeous. I’m 5’2, 145 LBS, and it was a bit snug, but beautiful.
Looked really expensive. You will have to steam out the wrinkles from shipping. I did undo one strap and loop/cross in the back so the straps wouldn’t fall down and I liked that look.

The dress looked so pretty on the site and after ordering a different dress from EverPretty that was absolutely amazing i decided to go with this one. I needed a reception dress for after my wedding ceremony. When I got it and put it on the entire bottom portion was see-through. You can even see white panties when it's on.  I ordered a custom dress due to being 5"5'  and the regular size was way to long. It cannot return because it was custom. Extremely unhappy with the quality of the dress!
Didn't fit right and verrrryyyyy see through
It fit really well, and was beautiful!! The straps were a little long and I had them shortened, but it was pretty cheap for a tailor to do or if you can sew you could easily fix!

This dress has a measurement chart but the sizing on there was off and the dress came too big. The quality of the straps wasn’t great. And I had to repair the zipper. The lace belt part constantly gets stuck in the zipper. The skirt overlay is kind of scratchy. Bought this as a bridesmaid dress but wouldn’t recommend it for something super formal.
This dress is very beautifully made. The fabric is very nice and the fit. Unfortunately I had to return the dress because I bought different models. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone.

It a wonderful dress the size was right it looks great and it’s comfortable it was a little loose but that’s cause I wear a 12 and I ordered a 14 because I didn’t want it to be tight around my chest and waist it was the right length for my height

This is a VERY lightweight dress. Simple and was exactly what I needed for a May Savannah wedding. I did have to have the seamstress add a layer to the bottom because it's see-through when the light hits it. Also needed some bra padding and a few other alterations. My alterations were more than the dress. But this is a decent dress, especially for the price

评论概述: Dress is not true to size
评论详情: I chose this dress as the bridesmaids dresses for my wedding. I received my daughter's and put it on her. It fit but was very tight and we had alot of trouble getting the zipper up. I ordered a size 10 and shes 5'2" and about 160pds. I would suggest sizing up. I thought size 10 would fit but it's to small for her. The arm straps are also big. I will be sending this back for an exchange.

absolutely gorgeous dress, fit perfectly and looked amazing - super flattering! really happy with the look and quality/purchase :) the only unfortunate part was the zipper being broken but nothing a quick trip to the tailor couldn't fix

评论概述: Great dress and value for the price
评论详情: I'm 5'8 a bit curvy, around 150lbs and I ordered a size 8 and it fit perfectly. The blush color is so pretty. I have an event in Rome with a dress up as a fairy tale character and I'm turning this into a woodland deer fairy costume. The dress is so pretty I could definitely see wearing it to a spring or summer wedding as well.

I am about 5'2 and 185 lbs with a 38 DDD I ordered a size 16. This dress fit like a glove. The waist wrap wasn't my favorite I couldn't quite figure it out and it wasn't as wide as I expected. I didn't love the way I looked in it so I returned it but it's a great quality dress and beautiful. Returning to Amazon and Ever-pretty has been super easy.
This dress was beautiful.  Will recommend

评论概述: Good for teen in wedding party
评论详情: There is a little stretch to the dress, which makes it work. Easy to customize the waist with the excess netting. net overlay is uneven at the hemline, but was able to be cut for a better luck. Overall, this dress is way cheaper than a bridal store.
Is a beautiful dress, fit perfectly and I got many compliments
More than expected. Beautiful dress and fits perfectly!
It was really pretty and very flowy but the zipper got stuck multiple times

I wore this to two weddings. One I left it floor length because it was so formal and for a second wedding I cut it shorter and it looked great. It was sooooo easy to shorten it with a scissor. So many compliments.
Beautiful dress for the price
This is a stunning dress. The color looks like the photos/description. The material is very nice and flowy. Love this dress!

All of my 4 bridesmaids ordered their size (4) (8) (10) (12) and all told the chest is a little too big, even with a large chested person. And strap on the shoulder is too long, but can be easy adjusted. Over all it’s a pretty dress. You will need small alterations. I don’t care what other reviews say. Just order your size.

This dress is made with cheap party rental table cloth fabric.  It is not at all how it is pictured.  Returned without even trying on. Also, somehow they charged me $39.00 shipping, which I totally would have rejected if I'd seen it during the original order.  Do Not Buy.
It was and ok dress just wasn’t for me and what I was looking for at the time
The Gown has that Elegant soft touch and it flow just the way I like it, I just have to take it up a little bit at the top, and it would fit perfectly, love my Gown
The straps were super long so I ended up cutting a piece off of the belt area that goes around a you and tied the straps together in a cute bow to make it work better but they were long.
I ask for a refund because it wasn’t what I expect, I have bought dresses before but this one it didn’t fit but I never get an approval refund due to private seller.

This dress was very pretty and would make a perfect bridesmaids dress. I bought it for a wedding (as a guest) and realized it wasn’t appropriate for that (looked like I should be IN the wedding). It was way too long for my 5‘2“ frame and was a bit tight in my midsection. Great quality for the price!

This dress is very light and elegant. Definitely worth it. This will be used as a bridesmaid dress during the summer and the materiel is super comfortable.

perfect fit, very nice . can't wait for wedding day on the beach. Kim

I was a bit skeptical but ordered anyway.  I was pleasantly surprised how fast I got in and how good it looked.  I did get it tailored bc I’m short person, and had an appliqué added to the straps.  Definitely recommend.

Loved this dress and would have worn it had we not runoff to Vegas. I did put a another skirt underneath to fluff it up and it looked great. I also tried it with a full length tulle skirt on top in a light blue and that looks great as well. It fit well it looks great; it was great value for money.

The color in person is a much lighter and brighter red. By the time I got to show the bride the return window had passed and they won't let me return it even though it's in unused condition with tags. This is not a true burgundy.
Fit perfectly! Highly recommend 😊

The dress design is pretty but the material is very cheap, i bought this rose colored and the sage green i did not even open, the other dress i understand the dresw did not cost a lot either but it was just insanely cheap, very disappointed, returned both dresses.. probably good fir photos only but not to wear for a real gathering
This dress is absolutely stunning! I am so happy that I bought it for my wedding!

I dont even want to post a photo bc of how disgusted i was at this dress. I ordered for a wedding based off all the good reviews about the dress being true to size...my A$$! I was measured at david’s bridal only a few days before ordering the dress here, and ordered the same size that i am at davids bridal-which is my true size...this company claims their dresses are true to size...just tried it on and it was EXTREMELY tight around my hips and waist which caused it to keep bunching up. The chest...LORD no. I would not be able to walk in public. Not remotely true to size, my boobs SPILLED out in every direction and there was absolutely NO support or way to adjust the straps. The material is cheap and see through. I will be requesting a refund for this crap.

This is a very pretty dress. I received quite a few compliments. For sure order up in size though. I generally wear a 14 but had to order an 18. I did this after buying a different ever-pretty dress in a 16 and it was still a bit tight around my ribs. If you have a larger chest (I wear a 38DD) then you might want to plan to put a safety pin in to hold the girls in, that or see it together. The length was perfect. I am 5’8. Returns are tricky. You will lose all money on the shipping to you and you will have to pay to ship it back as well. I lost a total of $22 in shipping. Actually I still haven’t received my refund for the dress after returning it either. Just make sure you are getting the right size so you don’t have to do that! Beautiful dress just not great customer service.

评论概述: Chest area large, straps a bit too long, dress very long
评论详情: I'm 5'6" and even with 3-4" heels on, this dress touches the floor. The chest area is large and would be good for a very large breasted woman but not so great for me at a 34C - there is a lot of extra space. The straps are a bit too long and not adjustable so I expect they would fall down all night without tailoring.

评论概述: Nice style and well made dress
评论详情: Beautiful color and style and well made. But I wanted a richer fabric (not tulle) and the bra cups were much too large for me

This is a lovely dress - beautiful rather than sexy. It's very long, with plenty of thin, floaty layers meaning it moves well. I also love the color - it's a gorgeous blush that looks great if I have a suntan, but also doesn't wash me out if I'm feeling pale. It has plenty of coverage, though you'll need to wear a low-back bra as the dress is a couple of inches below bra level at the back. It's also very comfortable. I wore it all day at a wedding and wasn't desperate to take it off at the end of the day (my shoes were another story!).

Ho acquistato questo vestito per un matrimonio a giugno. È arrivato ancora prima della data prevista di consegna. Devo dire che è molto bello sia come vestibilità sia come tessuto. La taglia grazie alle altre recensioni è giustissima. Sono molto felice
colore leggermente più scuro che in foto e bustino un po’ abbondante, ma comunque molto carino

Beautiful dresses, good quality for the price and very flattering. Only negative is the sizing comes up small so check the measurements or order one size up. Overall very satisfied and my bridesmaids are happy!
